channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: West Virginia National Guard member dies after being shot in DC attack, Trump says

item.title: One of the National Guard troops shot in D.C. attack has died, Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday night that Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom has died. Beckstrom was one of the National Guard troops shot in Wednesda...

item.title: Second National Guard member shot in D.C. is "fighting for his life," Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday evening that 20-year-old Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom died from her injuries in the Washington, D.C., shooting.

item.title: Refugee groups worry about backlash after shooting of National Guard soldiers in DC
6.0 magnitude earthquake strikes northwest of Anchorage, Alaska: USGS
item.description: A 6.0 magnitude earthquake has struck northwest of Anchorage, Alaska, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.

item.title: Death toll in Hong Kong high-rise fire rises to 94 as 3 people are arrested
item.description: A deadly blaze ripped through bamboo scaffolding on a multi-tower housing estate in Hong Kong, killing dozens of people and leaving hundreds more miss...

item.title: Police investigate after American man found fatally stabbed in Tobago
item.description: The death of an American man apparently fatally stabbed on the Caribbean island of Tobago is being investigated as a murder.

item.title: Trump criticizes the program that brought Afghan refugees to the US who fought the Taliban
Trump administration orders green card "reexamination" from "countries of concern"
item.description: The review comes after an Afghan national who arrived in the U.S. in 2021 was arrested in the shooting of two National Guard members.

item.title: WATCH: 2 National Guardsmen shot near White House, officials say
item.description: One suspect is in custody, police said.
